message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GR 

The paper focuses on traffic surveillance camera calibration and speed measurement of passing vehicles, which involves computer vision and robotics. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel automatic scene scale inference method, which involves machine learning and artificial intelligence, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a likely category as well. The paper also evaluates its method on a recent comprehensive dataset for speed measurement, which involves data analysis and machine learning, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) a possible category. Finally, the paper involves robotics and automation in traffic surveillance, making cs.RO (Robotics and Automation) and cs.GR (Graphics) possible categories as well.
